Title: Prohibits the use of algorithmically set prices and requires the disclosure of automated pricing systems
Summary: Prohibits the use of algorithmically set prices; requires the disclosure of automated pricing systems; creates a private cause of action for violations of such prohibition.
LawCode: Amd ยง349-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the use of algorithmically set prices and requires the disclosure of automated pricing systems
